content.detailedDescription: Went outside and was looking around and saw a light above the trees that were about 2 to 3 blocks away. the light was steady the dimmed, then another next to it lite up and dimmed and brightened. i video taped this for a while. looking through the camera i could see more than the two objects. farther away i saw 5 then a 6th one show up and then a seventh show up. i thought they were being recorded but it did not show up probably because of distance. they had different colors blue red orange. my wife was with me watching as well. in my video the lights on the right are street lights. i went inside for a while then came back out and saw the two closer objects go up in the air higher and farther to the left then watched them fly to the ground fast! then i figured it was over with and they landed. but i went back in to grab my video again and came out and they rose up and disappeared.
content.summary: Two to six objects in sky

content.detailedDescription: Tradionaly my husband and i celebrate the new year by ringing a large cow bell (real, handmade, and antique) to ring in the new year. as i was swing around in a circle with my cowbell clang away, when i was facing downtown cassville, mo, i spotted a long narrow cigar shaped object hanging down by the point of the object. it was bright red in color and was aproxitmately 50 feet in length. it blinked its lights several times and disapeared into into the night after turning its lights off. it was the first time i had seen this object and i think we caught its attention with the noise of our bells.
content.summary: Cigar shaped object over down town cassville responding to my ring a cow bell to ring in the new year

content.detailedDescription:
look like a et or reptilian but you can tell it is what who or what was currently playing on tv just distorted which was not the case at all this time which is why i really focused on it and it froze just like the pictures  will send but it d do didn't distort like usual with lines everywhere and being barely visible, this was earily clear, so here i will kind of describe the best i can and i will post the pics in order now i dont have a before pic as i knew not what was about to happen but  will explain what was on before the incident and i the first pic will be a photo of the whole screen and then pics with different angles (please notice in the bottom right of the pics, i have one zoome in pic of it there i is four heads, one looks eerily like me, then a reptilian type, then one im not sure and on the very bottom a humanoid baby and there really small especially to the main entity) and the last pic will be of what came on as soon as the "transmission ended. -so i am watching digital channel 49.1 a buffalo channel and the show that was on finished and a news weather update came on and as the guy is pointingcamera staring directly into the camerea and i could hear him breathing and i was frozen in fear until i seen in the bottom right corner this weird looking baby head and i immediately picked up my cell phone and taking pics. i noticed the other beings after. the next day i slept all day i just couldn't keep my eyes open and haven't felt normal yet and starting getting axious ant continue to feel scared as i make this report and my tablet has been acting up, freezing and misspelling words which i never do but i feel it should be reported and i know its not what you guys normally deal with but don't know who else to report it too. thank youaway to his green screen the t flashed for a second and then as you see in the pic showed up and it seemed frozen and i thought it would pass but i started panic attacking and it felt like i was being watched so i look closer and it was impossible not to see because there is a creepy human looking guy kneeling down resting his elbow on something directly in front of thes mentioned before this is not the first time this has happened before but never was i able to get photos of the "transmission" and even though it was only 1 minute and 23 seconds (exact time give or take 1-2 seconds) it never lasted that long. also this is coming through my television and i use a digital tv antenna  that is all, no sattelite, cable, no wifi and i dont even have a landline telephone. the first thing that i noticed happens before this occurence is lots of static electricity and lots of it, then the tv signal will go out or become distorted (like it does somewhat regularly as it is a antenna and its nothing extraordinary) and  eventually i notice usu usually 1 or 2 "beings" that look "reptilian" but small sized and they seem to be comunicating to each other not facing the screen, and its only a few flashes of them maybe 4 secons each flash and maybe 45 seconds everything is gone static and all as well i never felt threatened, if anything i felt a overwhelming sense of comfort? now that happened 3 times before basically exactly same way, i should add though this was a different apartment and the last time it occurred was about 1 year ago. now this time the static never came but 5 minutes before i felt really uneasy for no particular reason i just figured it was the weather as it was fairly stormy and the t tv had been distorting a lot due to the weather a and honestly sometimes the digital picture will freeze and distort and sometimes make someone on the tv
this text was 3 different sections copyand pasted so they may not have bbeen in order, sorry.
content.summary: This was not a unidentified "flying" object it was in my opinion "a genuine transmission from different types of et's from a ufo no r other planet" and not the first one to happen to me but the first with pictures. i do consider myself as "awakened" .

content.detailedDescription:
Looking out my second story window directly to the east (latitude 52ish)i saw a great big explosion in the sky. i thought it was a mid-air plane explosion with fiery debris spreading out in many directions. i yelped and my wife jumped up to look out the window with me, but it was gone by that short time (3-4 seconds). it was so close that i thought i would hear sirens shortly after and/or news of a plane crash. it was really big and so it might have been further away than i thought... could've been as far away as manitoba or even ontario. i did not see a tail like one usually does when they see a shooting star.

i notified the news agencies and searched online to see if anybody else saw it. one facebook friend in saskatoon said her husband saw it and states "randy saw it too. he was up early watching t.V. and saw it out of the corner of his eye, and he said it looked very big. we'll have to check the news tonight."

thanks, hollis.

ps. please note that saskatchewan does not follow daylight saving time; they stay the same all year long and just move time zones. it was 0622 sk time.
content.summary: Great explosion and disintegrated

content.detailedDescription:
It was in around 5.30 pm in the evening. the sky was cloudy but still brightly lit. i had just thrown a bag of rubbish out and was closing my gate when i looked up and saw a black object. my first reaction was i thought i saw a bird. however, something was not right as the object has no wings and was flying quite high in the sky. the area that i am staying is where passenger planes flies and i am quite accustomed to the height of these planes are flying. the object i observed was flying at approximately the same height of these passenger planes are flying. that at this point in time i realize that i am not witnessing a bird (to high for a bird, no wings) or balloon (too big) but an unidentified object. i have my iphone with me at the time and i quickly start to record the object. i had a clear view of the object, it is very large (the size of the nose or cockpit section of a passenger plane). the object is flying very fast, the speed of an passenger plane. to recap, i am quite accustomed to passenger planes flying above my house. the object is square like but as it flies and turns, i can see that the top part of the object is rectangular with straight lines running across from the center to the edge. the object did not emit any sound at all as it flew by.I lost sight of the object when it flew to the back of my house.
i have shown the video to a few of my close friends but none of them can explain what flew by my house that day.
content.summary: The object/ufo is square/rectangular in shape. it is definitly not round. there are straight lines going across from the center to the edge of the object, kind of like you see in an umbrella.
content.locationName: Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur

content.detailedDescription: March 10th 2016, florida 7:05 pm i did not see a thing and either did my older son, i did feel very fast blast of heat from my feet to my head, similar to that of a direction heater. i felt like i was being scanned like a barcode. *** and ***did see something...And were actually scared.At first i thought it was a bug, but it was dark but my camera's light was off because we were looking at the moon.It looks close, but then looking at it again, it seemed to go under the first cloud and over the second.I slowed it down and took some screen shots...And i still don't know what it was.
content.summary: March 10th 2016, florida 7:05 pm i did not see a thing and either did my older son, i did feel very fast blast of heat from my feet to my head, similar to that of a direction heater. i felt like i was being scanned like a barcode. *** and ***did see somet

content.detailedDescription: There are two incidents to report, the first was approximately 30 years ago, my 10 year old son was dong a report for school on constellations. as we (my son, my wife and i) stood on our darkened deck in front of our house and looked at the sky for the various constellations he needed to observe we noticed a light that i thought was a high flying jet at least that was what i told my son it was when he pointed it out to me. then we noticed a second light, similar to the first that appeared to be on a collision course. i explained to my son that they were at different altitudes and it was not a danger that they should converge in the sky. seconds later after making this explanation to my son it became clear that there was a third converging light and that they were all going to intersect, each forming a 120 degree angle with each other. i explained to my son that this was a much more rare occurrence but that it was no big deal they would all pass over or under the other and continue on. we all watched carefully, me more incredulous than the other two because i am a pilot and i had only seen two aircraft intersect like this before, never three. but what came next was even more impressive. the three came together and rather than continuing on they appeared to bounce off of each other and gain significantly in velocity.  i stood there with my mouth agape trying in vain to explain what i had just witnessed. then as we watched the lights move away from the convergence point they seemed to slow down as they grew nearer to the horizon, then slow to a stop and start moving back toward the convergence point again. this time they came together accelerating visibly and again they seemed to bounce off each other and reverse course right back to very near the horizon again, and to repeat the slowing down, stop and accelerate toward each other again. kind of like watching two dall sheep banging heads together. but this time the velocity was much faster perhaps taking only a second or two from the time of the stop to the time of the convergence. but this third time proved to be the last as when they converged they accelerated to past the horizon and well over the tops of the mountains to the north, southeast and southwest of anchorage. i only report this now as my son was doing a similar sky-watching and constellation observing session with his 12 year old daughter just a few days ago. i did not see this second and most recent ufl sighting. these lights in the sky must not have been objects as i understand it. there was no noise, no explosion, no obvious exhaust and no sonic booms. at the height these objects were flying they clearly were breaking the speed of sound, but no noise was heard at all. i wonder if anybody else in the anchorage area has ever seen such an incident. all i could tell my son and wife was darned if i know. i didn't actually say darned but you don't need my colorful language for this report. i wish i had been there for the second incident, i nearly always have my smartphone handy these days. sorry to say, i don't have anything to back up what i saw. just the honest observation of common citizens.
content.summary: 3 way convergence and separation at higher velocity

content.detailedDescription: I was in an industrial park on a dark side of a building. i work nights and i was outside on my break. it was a clear night and i was looking up at the stars when i noticed a shooting star out of the corner of my eye. i have seen many shooting stars in my life so i knew to look quick because they are gone so fast. so i turned my head to look at it and i was kind of shocked how slow the shooting star was going. then i noticed it was what i would describe as 3 somewhat fuzzy or hazy not real bright but very easy to see white lights in a triangle shape traveling in a straight line due east very very fast. it was about a 1/3 the speed of a shooting star. made no noise. i did not notice it until it was almost above me and it was at the horizon in probably less then 3 seconds. unbelievably fast but not so fast i couldn't get a good look at it and watch it. i really have no idea how high it was flying but i would have to guess maybe a mile. the feeling i had was i thought i couldn't believe what i just saw and i was very happy i got to see it. i want to see it again. instantly addicted. maybe the most awesome thing i ever seen. at the same time it is a bit scary. don't know what to think. i wish i had someone with me to witness it too. i seen something that awesome and no one cares not even my wife. told me to forget about it and move on. she don't want to hear about it anymore. been looking up at the sky for the last 20 years. i know a lot about astronomy. i laugh at ufo stories. very ironic i'm typing this right now. i would consider myself an excellent witness. i've been  trying to come up with all kinds of theories of what it could have been from satellites maybe reflecting sunlight very sharp beams in the sky, to car dealership spotlights. who knows, but their were no cloud layers in the sky to concentrate a beam of light on.???  it has taken me a couple days to stop trying to come up with an explanation for it. i'm sure i'll always wonder. i would have to say it was most definitely a very very fast flying object. not some sort of light trick. unbelievable. hope it's american!
content.summary: 3 lights in shape of a triangle very fast. about 1/3 speed of a shooting star. went across half the sky in 2 to 3 seconds

content.detailedDescription: I was working in the day as a restaurant deliver and see in the sky around maybe 200 feets a perfect disc metallic who reflect the light a little im the middle of the disc my brain doens t regonized anything that can be built by human the ufo was perfectly stationnary like he was a spot in the sky this event change in what i was believing and i don t know if they want me to see them or if it s voluntary by them i don t know i see the object perfectly i have no lights no propultion he s not affected by the wind or nothing i just look down to park my car for a coup'e of second and when i look up my eyes the object was disapear like he never been there i was shock by what ive been seen and people at work laugh at me put the next week in the repentigny hebdo rive nord the front page was talking what they called l ovni de repentigny .Hundred of people have reported to ovni quebec that they seen a ufo and people take pictures but in the night full of lights in the sky in form of disc people have reported to see the ufo in repentigny,  epiphanie and maybe other towns around ,me, i see the ufo in the day and after people of my job was don t laugh at all they was really surprised and take me really more serioustly ,this apparition changed my life at first i was thinking the object was giant air ballon i don t know but fast realised that it was nothing i ever seen in my life . my brain doens t understant what it is it takes a couple of seconds to realized that it was a ufo . with a google research i can found the newspaper in archives with the date and more information
content.summary: I was working as delivery restaurant and see perfectly the ufo when i was driving

content.detailedDescription: It was 2010. i was 12 at the time. i finally decided to come out with my story after my dads friend told about his ufo experience. me and my father just finished watching a movie he asked me to take out the trash. i walked outside grabbed the trash cans then made my way up the driveway. i reached the top of the driveway placed the trash cans down as i turned to walk back inside i noticed out of the corner of my eye 5 blues lights perfectly placed apart spinning in a circle manner. the lights then started to come towards me. something came over me.. something i will never forget. i couldn't move. my body was in a trance like state. it got to the point to where it was right over me. then out of no were it vanished. i ran faster then i ever had in my entire life back inside. i couldn't even speak to my parents i was so scared. after awhile i started to calm down i told my parents what i saw. they didn't believe me. for the next 3 years i had trouble sleeping. it was truly an awful experience. i really want some answers. i have so many questions. thank you for reading my story. this type of study interest me greatly.
content.summary: 5 blue lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was a passenger in my father's vehicle while driving south on the i-5 freeway, going from medford to talent. while on the freeway, i noticed a craft slowing coming over the mountains to the south. i pointed it out to my dad who said it was just a plane. i said, that's no plane.

when we came to the talent exit, the craft was over the walmart in talent. i told my dad to pull in the parking lot so i could take a picture. it took him forever and the craft was going away. he was slowly cruising the parking lot and i told him "stop! just stop here!". i jumped out and took four photos before it was gone. 

the craft was triangle shaped with three big white/yellow lights near each corner, with a small red light on the bottom center. the craft seemed like it "knew" i was taking pictures and seemed to speed up it's acceleration. it was flying along the west side of the 5 freeway, headed northbound from the south. by the time i took the photos, the red light was gone and the white-yellowish lights appear yellow-orange in the photos.

my father also witnessed it when he got out of the vehicle. he now has no, or very little, recollection of the event.
content.summary: Triangle w/ 3 big white-yellow lights, red light in center, slowly cruising northbound from the south, along west side of i-5, no sound, body black and transparent at same time, but could see craft.

content.detailedDescription:
Last night at 20:08 my office was shaken by what sounded as a large engine craft. i went outside to see it. it was heading north @ i75 just south of beltline rd, richardson tx. approximate air speed of 110k. (below landing speed) it appeared to be a large triangular craft similar to 737 class. at azimuth i estimated it under 2500 ft. as it rolled right it went in to a full vertical wing turn to the east. i could see all 4 tip markings and a couple of lights not common to that type of craft. it was a large triangular shape. low and slow. it disappeared behind a tree line from view. it then became a streak of light with an almost vertical path. appearance remaining as a vertical winged triangle yet now at extreme speed. it disappeared to high altitude. 

i have flown 37,57 ferry and tests. i have seen ufo's before. never over urban dallas. i notified the faa requesting confirmation of flight test from luv. faa denies any activity.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Too low and slow to be a normal aircraft in this vacinity. appeared to be wing vertical

content.detailedDescription: I was going on my 10am work break @ the 3735 castor ave. phila location. walking out of our courtyard door i felt compelled to look skyward.My eyes immediately locked on to a floating football'ish-shaped craft, hovering @ 11-o'clock.Three-co-workers were already outside there but since i never took my eyes off the object i initially do not know who they are.Object is shiney/silverish on the upper portion as this is the suns reflection. bottom portion is less shiney/dull-silverish.The entire object appears to be spinning/rotating but stationary.Within seconds the object moved from 11 o'clock to a farther and lower 2 -o'clock position.I asked the people who's voices i heard behind me if they see what i have been looking at and 2 of the 3 say yes !Finally, the 3rd person says yes,too! as we are looking at the object we are asking outloud, "what is that" bc it's not a known spacecraft.Two of the 4 of us are pharmaceutical pkg. mechanics which are knowledgeable in many disciplines of the mechanics of devices/machinery and have hobbies/interests of modern vehicles of flight.By now, 3-4 mins. of observation time has passed and at this time we still are puzzled by what we are seeing. next, the the appearance ( shiney-surface) has somehow changed and the vehicle ...Doesnt start to move..It just moved!As if it were already traveling at a steady-constant rate of speed. there was no gradual acceleration !It moved fast as it was finally going to go from the start and within approx. 3-seconds it left the area headed from the east where first seen to the north. and it was gone ! my job warrants paying attention to details..Minute details. unfortunately, there was not a cloud in the sky and i say that for the lack of a reference. to compare for the size, the height ..For comparison reasons.This was seen in broad daylight ! not the cloak of darkness as one might think. above a major road in a major city!The lack of a slow gradual start was not there either, it moved in a fast-steady rate like a car sitting at a red traffic light and another car passing thru that red traffic light w/o stopping moving past the stopped car. objects inside this craft had to be pinned to the walls inside!!! i am glad that 3-other witnesses were there,too.The sighting made me feel small/powerless and it felt personal and i felt relieved when it left for the northern skies!
content.summary: Silver,shiney bright reflecting the sun on top  but less bright on lower portion. football-shaped. hovereing, changed position in sky then moved quickly at steady fast speed. no sound no vapor trail disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: En 1980 un soir de septembre vers 21 ou 22hrs aprã¨s mon travail comme chef garde-manger a l'hotel estã©rel.Je me rendait chez moi en direction du village de ste-marguerite du lac masson.Se soir la il y avait un peut de brouillard juste au dessus des arbres.En arrivent au dessus d'une cã´te,j'apperã§ois un objet de la grosseur d'une chaudiã¨re de 5 gallons,tout blanche en forme d'un oeuf sur le cã´tã© qui avancait tranquillement vers le n/w et qui projetait un vaisseau lumineux en forme de conne trã¨s brillant qui ã©tait fixe et qui pivotait de temps a autre.Je l'ai perdu de vue en descendant la cã´te.Je me suis dã©pãªchã© avec ma voiture pour essayer de l'apercevoir plus loin (au village) mais sans rã©sultat. un km plus loin, je l'ai revue au dessus de la savane. je me suis stationnã© au garage municipale, j'ai ã©teint le moteur de ma voiture et j'en suis sortie. a ce moment il y avait aussi la prã©sence de deux personnes sur le balcon de leurs rã©sidence qui regardais la mãªme chose que moi. l'objet ã©tait silencieux et continuais sa route ver le nord-ouest tout en illuminant de faã§on intermittente son projecteur ver le sol. il disparu par la suite derriã¨re la montagne.
content.summary: Oeuf blanc claire sur le cotã©,de la grosseur d'une chaudiã¨re de 5 gallons.

content.detailedDescription: Ce moment la j'ai lever les yeux au ciel et j'ai vue une immense trainã©e noir comme le font les rã©actã© amis elle ã©tais plus de 1000x plus grand se dirigent vers le nord sans savoir quelle engin aurais commis cela puisque je voyait aussi comme poursuivant cette trainã©e un rã©actã© militaire qui lui dã©montrais une trainã©e blanche. je me suis dit que l'engin poursuivi devais ãªtre 1000x plus gros que le petit rã©acter pour ã©mettre une trainã© noir si grosse ã  plus de 10,000 ou 20,000 pieds. j'ai crue qu'en poursuivant en camion, je pourrais voir plus de dã©tail mais en vain avec la diffã©rence de ma vitesse. j'ai immã©diatement pensã© ã  un ovni.
content.summary: Trainã©e noir 1000x plus grande que la trainã© d'un rã©actã©

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 2200 hours, i was in the kitchen when i noticed a z shaped object with green and red lights slowly descending in the eastern sky...Not a helicopter, i know how they land, and it made no sound.  it was raining and windy, not fireworks, not a balloon...The hue of the lights is what made me go outside....I watched it slowly and controllably, go down behind the eastern tree line....I 
have never, never see lights if this hue....
content.summary: Morgan hill

content.detailedDescription: It was wednesday july 22nd approximately 8:30pm.My girlfriend had a camera meet-up with a group of photographers on the lee bridge in richmond,va!I wasn't part of the group so i went to explore under the bridge near the water.I was walking a path when i felt something strange, i can't explain the feeling but i turned around and behind me was four objects in a straight line from left to right hovering with no noise.I was excited so i ran back  up the hill where i was parked to get the camera and ran back to the sight.At this point they separated and only 2 objects was left. i was tired at this point from  running and i just started filming. i knew it wasn't a plane or helicopter because i see those everyday, i also can hear them when they in the area.This was different because the movement was slow,@ 1 point it completely stopped in the air, it was silent and no features i could see other than color and what looked like flames coming from 1 of the objects.The 1st object was black w/flames the 2nd came in later in the same video was all white.To all the none believers (tonia w.) start believing!!!
content.summary: Crazy n calm

content.detailedDescription: I was lying in back yard, as i often did at night, to observe shooting stars and satellites passing over, when from the south over the roof of my neighbor's house, the large stretched z-shaped object appeared. it's movement was end over end, silent, and from south to north. it was obvious to me immediately that there was no way we had the technology for something like it. it's direction took it over china lake naval weapons base. my heart was beating fast when i saw it, naturally. i got up and walked to a point in my yard where i watched it until it couldn't be seen. i fully believed at the time, and still do, that i saw an alien craft. i've often looked online but have never seen a description of a craft the likes of the one i saw.
content.summary: Similar to the old merlin handheld game. object was a large stretched z

content.detailedDescription:
We went to the nascar races at phoenix international raceway today, saturday. but we were late. races had ended. we got there about 2:40pm and all spectators were leaving in their cars.

so we drove around for about 15 minutes then ended up on n dysart rd, a couple miles south of i10 freeway. we drove north on n. dysart rd to the i10 on ramp. i was in the passenger seat looking out my window.

we went east on the on ramp, slowly accelerating up to freeway speed. as i looked out my window i noticed a jetliner about 50* maybe 60* above the horizon, about 30* off center from the direction we were traveling, at least 5 - 10 miles away. it was small, but i could easily tell what it was. then i thought to myself " i wonder if there are any other planes in the sky?" so i started scanning out my window in the 100% clear and bright blue sky to see if i could find another one.

that's when i saw a small rectangular dark object 90* directly to the south of us; perpendicular to my passenger window. about 25-30* above the horizon. i estimate it was anywhere from 1/4 mile to 1 or 2 miles away from us. it appeared to be stationary. i was trying to figure out what it was because there were no wings like a plane, no visible engines, no shape that would suggest it held passengers, no rotors or a tail like a helicopter, no noise, and not even a definite shape. so i thought "maybe it's a balloon? no it couldn't be, even helium balloons don't sit perfectly still."

then it slowly started moving west. i thought to myself "oh, it's moving, maybe it somebody's radio control toy?" then it started moving faster. i had to turn my head quickly to keep it in my field of vision over my right shoulder. 

the object immediately went backwards without even turning or slowing down, and then it went forwards again. i couldn't believe what i saw. a couple seconds later it appeared to turn in a southerly direction, this time "leaning into the curve" like a plane would do. 

that's when i got a clear view of the top of the object because the sun was reflecting off of it. it was saucer shaped! definitely made out of some type of metal.  [no windows, doors, hatches, or anything else, just smooth metal that i could see.]

the object made 1 or 2 more direction adjustments in 1/10th of a second, appeared to head west again (its original direction) at a high rate of speed. i blinked my eyes because my brain was still trying to figure out what i saw.  when i opened my eyes, it was gone.  

i started scanning the sky again to see if it was still around but in a different position. i couldn't find the object, but i saw a helicopter which appeared to be traveling in a sw direction a few miles east of where i saw the object.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saucer shaped object seen over avondale az

content.detailedDescription:
I haven't had much time to report this ufo incident but i wrote down all he information immediately afterwards and noted the exact time it happened. i was traveling home on i-85 south going towards exit 76 in salisbury. around the area of exit 81 i noticed the craft in the sky. having seen strange sites on this hwy in the very recent months i decided to see if this craft was moving or weather it was hovering like many ufo's do. there were flashing lights on it as with typical aircraft so i doubted it would be anything but what appeared to be a jet military craft. as it turns out the craft was not moving across the sky at all. i in fact, passed directly under this craft as i got close to exit 79 and got a good look at it as it hovered in place above me.
the front end appeared to move from side to side in a very mechanical type movement. the craft had the classic tr-3b round lights on each end of it's triangle shape. these lights were orange and pulsating. the belly of the craft was lit up with white light. it had a silver appearance with grooves and appeared to reveal even the bolts that the craft might have been built with. this was at least my perception of it. the craft appeared to have 2 antenna arms that came out of the front of it that bent down vertically and then curved straight out again. there were small blinking white lights on the end of these antenna-like arms.
content.summary: The ufo appeared to be a tr-3b (military craf).

content.detailedDescription: As i got off of work in sandy springs i went to my usual bus stop. myself and a couple of other people kept hearing a low humming noise so when we looked up we saw 3 red lights in the shape of a triangle. at first i thought it was one of those airplane towers but then the lights turned green which i've never seen before. after a few seconds of it still sitting in the same spot it started to slowly move to the right a few feet then proceeded to shoot off at an extremely fast speed. i took a picture of it with my phone after the lights turned green but unfortunately the camera on my phone isn't very good but it is proof the i saw something.
content.summary: Three lights in shape of triangle that changed color then took off

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were having a sleep over late at night about 4 years ago. i woke up at 3:59 and still in my sleeping bag. i looked out  into the dark sky through the space in between my friends bedroom blinds. 1 minute later i check my phone it's 4:00 am and i start watching youtube videos before i notice through the crack in the blinds what i thought was a plane but quickly realized it was flashing to fast and moving way to slow for a plane. i also noticed it was square, i wake up my friend as fast as i can in his bed. he is tried and annoyed, i show him the object in the sky and he is as fascinated as i am. i snap a quick pick of the object. then i noticed it was speeding up and the lights seemed like it was on fire or fiery.  it only moved in a straight line, and i would stay in our vision for 5-6 minutes, the window was open a little bit and we couldn't hear anything. me and my friend felt puzzled and scared. we don't know what to make of it and thought you guys can help explain.
content.summary: Square like, it. went across the sky very slowly, enough time to take a picture, flashing a lot like 3 times a second and lights looked like they were broken and i could see a small fire or sparks coming of the lights

content.detailedDescription:
it was clear, warm august evening approximately 10 at night. there was still a little light on the horizon. i stepped outside on the deck for a cigarette and looked into the sky like i often do. i scanned the eastern horizon above the mountain's and watched an aircraft fly over the mountain traveling north. that's when i focused in on a star or what i thought was a star after the plane had passed it. i continued to watch the star as it seemed quit bright and it oddly flashed (pulsated). it was not long before i realized it was not a star at all but a moving object. i ran inside to grab my cell phone and went back out to record it. i have about a minute of it traveling across the sky. i took my eyes off the object for a moment to take a step down the stairs and when i looked back it was gone. i continued to search for it for several minutes without any luck. there was no other stars in the sky at that point. i have seen many satellite's in my life and can 100% say it was not a satellite or plane. it had no flashing beckon like planes do and it was traveling much to fast not to mention it was pulsating.
 i also have witnessed something else i think is interesting. i down loaded the google moon app not to long ago. i was searching the vas landscape when i came upon a crater that has what very much looks like a massive structure inside. it has all the characteristics of a building. with also a plume of smoke ascending from what looks like a chimney of a house. i took a close up screen shot of the structure and a screen shot from the regular view before zooming in. everyone i have shown the screen shot to sees exactly what i see without me telling them what i think it is. when i tell them it is a screen shot from google moon they are astonished. 
  i was not sure what to do with tis information and have wondered if anyone else has come across the structure. i have looked into the subject and found out there has been a lot of evidence about structures on the moon. so i decided to document my information with mufon. 
  the images of both the moon and video of the ufo are on my phone. i am using my computer to submit this. i personally think both the image and video are amazing and if anyone from mufon would like to view it please contact me as i do not know how to attach if from my phone to my computer, i am not computer savy in any way. 
 
thank you for reading my testimony.

phillip j prins
content.summary: Glowing pulsating object traveling at a fast rate well in earths atmosphere

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i were heading south from morrisville, vt., approximately 7:30-8:30 pm on friday, march 4th, 2016. i would say that this occurence happened about 15-20 minutes south, possibly near wolcott, vt., in a heavily forrested area. (i'm pretty sure this was on route 15.) the sky was very dark and clear, a picture perfect evening to see the stars in great detail.  i felt compelled to look up to the sky, because of its immense clarity, knowing that vermont has probably, one of the cleanest skylines in the world, something that i don't particularly have, living 2 1/2 to 3 hrs east of this particular location.  i,coincidentally,happened to be thinking in my mind at that moment, "wouldn't it be cool to see a ufo out here!" and then, low & behold, something occured...

i was in the passenger seat, and out to my right window, in the west, a slight degree above the faint outline of the tall mountains, i happened to observe approximately 5-10 white, orb-lights, flashing & "dancing" chaotically, in a pattern-less manner. even though they produced these motions, the lights mainly stayed in the west for the 15-20 minutes that i observed them.  they would descend & ascend a slight bit, with some variation of movement, but mainly stayed centralized, in that location.  after a few minutes, possibly 5 minutes or so, i would place my attention to something else & then look back & the lights would disappear, the pop back up again.

i instinctively & intuitively knew that what i was witnessing, surely was no human-made satelites, as even those, as far as i've observed, don't travel in more than 1-2 at a time & usually have some type of recognizable pattern in their flashing and movement. also, they don't "dance", and usually stay on course in their path.  after these few minutes, i brought the lights to the attention of my boyfriend, but he could not witness them right away because he was driving.  

at the beginning stages, i was pretty amazed by what i saw, but at the same time, i wasn't overly shocked,either. sometimes, i felt, "matter of fact" and "non-challant" about all of it.  i didn't feel threatened by this experience.  at times, i was thinking scientifically, becoming skeptical & trying to conjure up possible practical explanations in my mind.  however, as i did so, those thoughts dissipated, because there was no logical explanation for what i saw!  

approximately 20 minutes from the first occurence, around the hardwick area, my boyfriend pulled off the side of the road, in an even more densely forrested area & finally saw, in the west, the "dancing" white orb-lights in the sky & was totally in agreeance with me, that these were no satellites, that this was something unexplainable occuring.  about another 5 minutes up the road, this time, ahead of us,i could see in the southwest direction, slightly above the horizon, but very low in the sky & it appeared to be close, three consecutive, ember like flashes-.....One.....Two.....Three....They each glowed intensely with reddish-orange, ember like flames for a second or so, one right after the other & then would fade, just as fast as they came.  i would best describe what i saw, in comparison to the ends of a cigarette, when the smoker inhales, the ends flame up & glow, and when they stop inhaling, the ends of the cigarrette fade.  at first, i thought that these glowing ember lights could possibly have been meteors fading out when hitting the atmosphere, but remembering the strange white lights in the sky earlier, just confirmed my ufo theory all the more!  

i pointed out these ember lights to my boyfriend, and he had seen the same occurance.  at that point, my attention was taken to something else.  my boyfriend kept on watching ahead, observing what was going on.  he noticed, that the ember glowing lights were at each end of, what he described as a very large, long, cigar shaped object, that was dark, but he could make out some of its outline. this observation happened shortly before we approached the end of route 15, near route 2 in danville, vt. area.  this location was still heavily forrested. at that point, we were getting a little spooked out.

what i also observed, was my psychological reaction.  in addition to what i had previously explained, i also felt that i was "meant" to see these crafts.  that, even though i have never seen a ufo, i was ready & receptive to experiencing a one-in-a-kind event.  i felt, that whoever & wherever these visitors were from, they came here on peaceful terms, to observe human life, but not to forthright interfere with us & that they meant no harm or threat in any manner.  i also sensed that humans are going to be sighting more spectacular sights like this in the near future-those who are receptive to these events, but also those who are not receptive at all-that their thoughts would be challenged, as well! no matter what these strange lights were, i will always be proud to have seen such phenomena that millions of people may never get to experience!
content.summary: 5-7 white orb lights flashing chaotically accross sky  & 3 circular reddish-orange ember lights near cigar shaped craft.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: i was driving on the street on western in torrance, and i saw two sphere like lights. one was white and the other was purple. they were going soooo fast that it's hard to explain and in the strangest directions. the two ufos were following eachother and they had a weird effect on people, you could not tell if it was 10 feet away it 5 miles away. they tricked your mind and your eyes. because of that you even could not tell there size. when i first saw this object i thought it was an airplane or a drone. but airplanes never move like that and it was going to far to be a drone. while my whole family is freaking out it goes over our car the head south and disappears behind a tree.
content.distance: 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
content.summary: Sphere like. very bright glow. it was so strange, could not tell if it was 10 ft away or 100. it had that strange effect. there were two moving super fast in strange directions follow in eachother. one moment it was 10ft away next it was 2 miles away

content.detailedDescription:
I am filing this report on behalf of my father, who at the time remains anonymous until i have established contact with mufon. this due to the fact, that this report refers to a military operation !
there is also several details i have to leave out due to the military aspect. and i urge mufon to contact me a.S.A.P, as to clarify how to approach and deal with these potential top secret information's further.

my father was a norwegian navy seal special ops deep sea diver specialist from approx 1968, until he was headhunted for extreme deep sea diving during the settling of the oil fields in the north sea (between england and norway) approx 1974.
all through my childhood i have been told stories about what they did during my father's navy seal years. 
as i got older (i am now 40 yrs) i started to get a feeling that there was things my father experienced that was far from the normal for any military ops. and i kept asking for any form of details of such for many years without finding anything abnormal or interesting. apart from insane deep diving experiments and such.
as my father got older too, i think the time limit for keeping military details secret ran out (this is just my assumption). and suddenly one day approx 5 years ago, while relaxing in his garden he just told me flat out the one thing i never had expected to hear, as uso/ufo's was very far from my mind in regards to me poking in his military history. in my mind i expected to hear some cold war stories about russians and usa and such, as he did allot of ops in the northern region of the atlantic ocean. so what he told me this day blew my mind !

in 1973 he was stationed at the navy base in the coastal town of bergen. and at the time he was occupied just doing normal training as they do most of the time, even though being special ops. when he suddenly gets called off from his units training routines, and was in all haste air lifted by helicopter off to one of the major fjords on the west coast of norway (details here is only for mufon).
there, in the middle of the fjord, several navy vessels was waiting, clustered as if searching for something. 
it must be said that these unique fjords go on for several hundred miles and are more than 3000 feet deep in places. so it immediately struck my father as an abnormal place for a mission. especially since the norwegian navy has a very good overlook on what goes in and out of these fjords. and ops and training was not normal in there as this is mostly cruise boat and tourist territory, and contains no known military installations.
on board of one of the navy ships, my father and another fellow deep sea diver he did not know, was put into oxygen/helium deep-divers equipment. a tell tale sign they were not just going surface diving, but that something more serious was under way. they were also given underwater military camera equipment. and here is where it all gets very mysterious !
their instructions was to document and observe, then report and debrief. and as they are lowered down to a depth of approx 250-350 feet it becomes very obvious what they are there to document.
there are deep track grooves on the ocean floor. just like the tracks from some kind of belted device like a bulldozer or a tank or other similar belted vehicles. but these tracks are more than 30 feet wide, and that is just one of the tracks. there are two tracks running parallel, and both are more than 30 feet wide. and counting in there is a permanent wide gap between them (approx 30-50 feet), it looks like a gigantic caterpillar bulldozer-looking thing has crawled forward through the bottom of this fjord.
my father told me, it immediately struck him (this being 1973) as very chilling, as it dawned on him that there are no known machinery or vehicle remotely close to the size of these tracks, that can move about under water in this fashion (and to his knowledge there is still no such "vehicle" that has been made till this date). and being a navy seal for so long, i know he was extremely well trained in observing and identifying vessels of all sorts from an underwater perspective. as he had told me so many times about some of his missions, where they go out from the torpedo tubes on submarines, and they swim over to place bombs on enemy ships or to observe vessels and other underwater military installations and such. so i trust his observations 100% on this, as did obviously the military as well ! 
after orientating themselves, they were told by surface command to film, take pictures and memorize all details of the gigantic caterpillar track as they were to follow it out through the fjord.
and here it gets even weirder. as my father and the other diver documented this track they had to swim one over each their own track, having to use strong military grade flashlights just to be able to see the whole width of the track. and as he told me, "it went on forever into the underwater horizon" and the track was hugging the landscape. or in other words, it had moved intelligently ! this was no scraping or drag-mark grooves suggesting something huge like a platform being hauled (very often platforms are built in these fjords because of the extreme depth and calm waters, then towed off to open sea on completion). this "object" had "rolled" forwards as if someone driving a bulldozer through a varied and uneven landscape. leaving two massively steady deep tracks in its wake. with a total width of more than 100 feet.
they swam for a very long time documenting this absurd monster groove, when it all of a sudden just abruptly stopped. and this puzzled them very much. as it looked like the "object" had just been lifted straight off the sea floor. this after having documented the track being more than 3 kilometers long.
there was no trace of it further out the fjord, and they where immediately call back to the surface to debrief. and shortly after my father was airlifted off the group of ships and returned to the base without any explanation as to the origin of this track or the overall purpose of this mission. which all struck him as very un-normal considering his regular ops. and he never heard a single thing about this mission later either. and soon after he as head hunted for the offshore oil industry. and retired from his military career. 

it has later dawned on me that i think the sudden headhunting into the oil industry was a form of "redirecting" of attention away from this and maybe other missions he will not tell me about, as to get him away and silencing him with money and jobs that took all off his waking hours up until the early 1990's.
but in his own words he explained it as something completely foreign to our technological capability, both now and then. and on my suggestion of "could this be uso/ufo related" he concurred with me !!

my conclusion after having lived next to this man my entire life, is that he is one of the most credible witnesses i could ever have imagined. his military track sheet, the navy seals integrity, then later more than 20 years as an offshore deep sea diver specialist (also used as an expert witness in several court cases) and now in his retired years, as a 10th grade grand mason ritual master (10th being the highest possible elevation in the norwegian freemason system). i must say i do not doubt his words and recollections one single bit. and i would put my full confidence in this man, as did the norwegian government, military, major oil companies and freemasons. 
and it must also be said, that my father has never really shown any interest in the uso/ufo phenomena and theories out there. and i cannot recall one singe time in my entire life, that he has mentioned  such things apart from this one day in his garden !

i ask for understanding as to some details being left for mufon only here. as i do not want any harm or repercussions to befall my dear old father.
so please take this report very serious, as do i. and please help me getting this sorted out. as this goes a far bit over what i can investigate on my own. and maybe it can help a bit, as to revealing another piece of the ufo/uso/alien/government puzzle.
content.summary: Military black ops investigation of 3 km pralell enormous underwater track marks in fjord

content.detailedDescription: Driving on route 180 at about 9:00 looked to the east south east and noticed a cigar shaped object just below the sun at first thought it was an aircraft very reflective, at a distance of over a couple of miles it looked very large. when object came out suns glare exspected to see it again like you would a commercial aircraft but it wasn't there.
content.summary: It appeared to be cigar shaped , very reflective  about 5 moons under the sun traveling very slow..Did not look like an aircraft.

content.detailedDescription: Just one half hour ago, i watched a aqua blue disk hover in the sky near my house. it moved just like ufos are said to, like a leaf in the wind. and a few times it jumped forward in the sky. it returned twice, and on last sight it pulsed a bloom of aqua color. there was no sound and no lights except the blue pulse. at first, i thought it could just be a bright star, but no star ever glowed such a color or moved. of course, i was excited. i look at the sky night and day hoping to see a ufo, and have many times in the past, this was the most beautiful by far.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Unexpected visitor

content.detailedDescription:
Sir

i am writing to ask a question. i own a cabin in sequoia national park located at 5000 foot elevation. about a year ago i was spending a week up in the mountains with my dogs. after watching tv at 10:00 pm i turned the tv off and went to bed. the bed room is on the top floor of a three story a frame. the bed is located under a bank of windows filling in the top of the a frame. my question is can a ufo shine a beam through a window and interfere with a sleeping person. i was awaken at 3:00 am i was in a setting position surrounded by a ultra white light the brightest light i have ever experienced. i had a felling that something was in the room with me. i put my arm in front of my eyes to shade my eyes from the light. it did not help i was inside this ultra white light and i was kind of blinded from the brightness. i could tell that the room was lit i think i said " what going on " at that moment the light just disappeared. i sat there in the dark for a couple of seconds then i turned on the light on the night stand next to the bed. my dogs did not wake up i did but i cannot explained why or what happened. i had a felling something was in the room but when i turned the light on there was nothing there. has your originations ever heard of anything like this happening to anyone else. anything you can do to help me understand this event would be appreciated.

larry wagner
70 years old
content.summary: I have a question

content.detailedDescription: Brian micheal weiss is a alien out of clovis new mexico 88101
